text: Heavenly Slug () is a 1946 Soviet comedy movie directed by Semyon Timoshenko.Небесный тихоход (1945) It stars Nikolai Kryuchkov, Vasili Merkuryev, and Vasily Neschiplenko. ==Actors== * Nikolai Kryuchkov - major Vasily Bulochkin * Vasili Merkuryev - senior lieutenant Semyon Tucha * Vasily Neschiplenko - captain Sergei Kaisarov * Alla Parfanyak - reporter Valya Petrova * Ludmila Glazova - Ekaterina Kutuzova * Tamara Alyoshina - lieutenant Masha Svetlova == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1946 comedy movies Category:Soviet comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Semyon Timoshenko
title: Heavenly Slug
